title: One Night Pregnancy
description: Rescued during a raging storm, sensible Bridget blushes scarlet when she finds herself seduced by a captivating stranger. How un-Bridget-like--she's mortified! But little does she know her rescuer is ultrawealthy... and ultraexclusive!Until she reads the newspaper headlines...Bridget's mystery man is none other than the notorious Adam Beaumont, heir to the Beaumont empire. Now Bridget has to find the words--and the courage--to tell him he left a "lasting" impression!
author: Lindsay Armstrong
